name: Promotion Class: Barbarian
description:
Role: Melee Control

Controlling enemies will cause this brute to become even more powerful.

Stat Adjustments:
Movement Control Intensity +21%
Attack Control Intensity +21%

Traits Granted:
Great Axe Mastery
Great Mace Mastery

Enhancements:
Leap: Now applies a Knockdown.
Whirling Pain: Now applies Slow then Suppress.
Neckbreaker: Now has cost reduced to 300 and applies Knockdown.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Barbarian promotion class and prevents access to the Pit Fighter and Alpha Warrior  promotion classes.
